officeEntities

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpsc433.Entity
      • officeEntities.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Entity>

    public class Room
extends Entity

    This class represents a room in the office allocation problem. It organizes important data such as a list of the people currently assigned to this room and another list of rooms that are close to a particular room. The size of the room is also stored here. The default room size is medium. The class includes a static array list with all Room instances created so far.

    The use of HashMap in this class allows for constant time checking if a room with a given name has already been created which is critical during the input file parsing phase of the program when this must be done every time a room-related predicate is encountered.
